````` ::: ::: # Agenda - White paper - Lyn - Website progress - Christina - CAMIS-ONCO - Soma Sekhar - Volunteers Roles - Conference Reps - AOB/ PHUSE feedback # Meeting minutes **White Paper Update: Lyn** Min-Hua is sending the white paper to the PHUSE group lead for review soon just a bit more tidying to do following comments. **Website progress: Christina\ **The home page now has the list of stats methods we are looking to collect data on. **ACTION :**Christina to put actions for each stats method which we need help to complete into github. We will assign those already selected to the people below. This will enable people that want to help to be able to see which are available for people to select. **CAMIS- ONCO: Soma Sekhar** - plan to launch later this week. - possibly white paper/ conference presentation. **Review of volunteer roles** - General Co-ordination -Lyn - Website Co-ordination / Home page table - Christina - CAMIS-ONCO - Soma Sekhar - Copying CSRMLW material to CAMIS - CMH: Aiming Yang - Linear Models: Brian Varney (ACTION: Set up call with Dani, Lyn, Vikash, christina, + anyone else whose interested in helping to please volunteer) - MMRM: Ben Arancibia - Survival: Min-Hua Jen, Mia Qi ACTION: Christina to also add "actions" for people to pick up the following duties. - Co-ordinator for conference material - share standard slides/ content /abstracts - Volunteer to design a CAMIS Logo - Social media rep - to co-ordinate posts (linkedIn/Twitter) - Conference reps/ attendees needed We will also add a page which lists the conferences so we can collate and coordinate whose going with the hope of advertising the project more widely once we have content on the website. Include a column for timelines/ abstract deadlines.
